labels.label:
0. Hive - table used for results: crypto_rates_2 which is saved in parameter: master_dataset_path
1. HDFS - Master dataset is located at: /user/vagrant/projekt/masterdataset/crypto_rates which is saved in parameter: master_dataset_path
3. HDFS - temporary files are stored in directory: /user/vagrant/projekt/hive/temp which is saved in parameter: hdfs_temp_folder
4. Hive - table used for temporary results (if exists - will be deleted): temp_table_crypto_rates_2 which is saved in parameter: hive_temp_table_name
2. Filter columns, change types, extract date filter to leave only crypto rates
3. Convert AVRO to ORC, save to a temp dir in HDFS
4. Execute HQL script: insert ORC from temp dir into a temp table and insert from temp table into final Hive table

Reads new AVRO files about rates of currencies, cleans and extracts data and puts to Hive table. Details: 1. Find new files in the master dataset - every 5 minutes. 2. Query every AVRO file: rename columns, cast types, filter rows (leave only type=crypto), add date. 3. Merge AVRO files to create a bigger file. 4. Save AVRO as ORC in HDFS in a temporary location. 5. Fill in the Hive QL script with the path and filename of the new file and execute it. 6. New rows are inserted in crypto_rates_2 table (clustered by currency name and partitioned by date). Note: HQL script creates the output table if it does not exist.
1. Loading new AVRO files from rates master dataset from HDFS

entry.value: select id as cryptocurrency_name, CAST(rateUSD AS DOUBLE) as rate_in_usd, CAST("timestamp" as timestamp) as timestamp_date, YEAR(CAST("timestamp" as timestamp)) as "year", MONTH(CAST("timestamp" as timestamp)) as "month", DAYOFMONTH(CAST("timestamp" as timestamp)) as "day" FROM FLOWFILE WHERE type LIKE '%crypto%'
